name: publish
description: The entire site created with Pickles 2 is written out to a static file.

path_region.description: Specify one directory path to be the target. If omitted, the current directory will be the target.

paths_region.description: Specify additional target ranges. Multiple ranges can be specified using an array.

paths_ignore.description: Specifies the paths to exclude from publishing within the target range specified by path_region. Multiple paths can be specified.

keep_cache.description: Skip deleting and regenerating the cache when initializing a publish operation.
